weekly picks (Apr 5 week 2024)

Posted on April 29, 2024 in 2024apr,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 Apr 5th week collection

  1. 2404.17363v1 Superconductivity with high upper critical field in an equiatomic high entropy alloy Sc-V-Ti-Hf-Nb (arXiv)

  2. 2404.17239v1 Broken time reversal symmetry vestigial state for a two-component superconductor in two spatial dimensions (arXiv)

  3. 2404.17072 Supercurrent Diode Effect in Helical Superconductors (arXiv)

  4. 2404.17501 Relations between normal state nonreciprocal transport and the superconducting diode effect in the trivial and topological phases (arXiv)

  5. 2404.17505 Detailed dynamics of a moving magnetic skyrmion lattice in MnSi observed using a small-angle neutron scattering under an alternating electric current flow (arXiv)

  6. 2404.17425 Weyl nodes in Ce3Bi4Pd3 revealed by dynamical mean-field theory (arXiv)

  7. 2404.17207 Six magnetization plateau phases in a kagome antiferromagnet with Y3Cu9OH19Cl8-type distortion (arXiv)

  8. 2404.17058 Exchange Interactions in Rare-earth Magnets A2PrO3 (A= alkali metals): Revisited (arXiv)

  9. 2404.16935 Disentangling spin excitation continua in classical and quantum magnets using 2D nonlinear spectroscopy (arXiv)

  10. 2404.17558 Dynamics of spin helices in the diluted one-dimensional XX model (arXiv)

  11. 2404.17373 Walking behavior induced by PT symmetry breaking in a non-Hermitian XY model with clock anisotropy (arXiv)

  12. 2404.17182 Excitonic response in TMD heterostructures from first-principles: impact of stacking, twisting, and interlayer distance (arXiv)

  13. 2404.17086 On the equivalence of the semiclassical theory and the response theory (arXiv)

  14. 2404.17539 Multifold topological semimetals (arXiv)
